name: Candy Scare - Team DINGO
description:
POLTERGEIST, CANDY, FROLIC, VOMIT Made By:

Adam Lutton (Art & Sound, Planning)

Alex Hall (Programming, 3D Art)

Description / How To Play:

You play as a poltergeist with a need for candy. A small girl frolics through a dark empty forest filled with broken electronics and thrown out Halloween decorations. Interact with these objects to spook the girl and get her to drop candy.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button does everything.
Press M to change moons.
